channel.title: Surface Tension: all stuck posts collection
channel.description:
Hello, I want to say first that you've done a very great job in about every aspect (except maybe marines damage/reactivity) on this remake.
I'm stuck here :
[url]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/1135162003816012730/4187781840F262EA975033C80D6C7E7EAC5CA127/[/url]
I know I have to do an airstrike in the original HL, but I don't know how to do it here, or maybe I have to do something else in Black Mesa? I've tried Use , Fire 1, Fire 2, no key work to launch the airstrike anywhere on the minimap. Somebody has already gone through it?
Thank you.

item.title: Surface Tension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: white_kite_fauna
item.description:
technically, you CAN get past the soldiers without killing the helicopter. I did.
You would not have much health left though.
But there are health packs before you kill vortigaunts, so it is doable. Not easy but doable

item.title: Surface Tension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: dev02ify
item.description:
It’s obvious that he ran across the bridge not knowing it would break, of course he didn’t jump in the water.

As for aimbot, the helicopter has two seats, which most likely means it has two people, one for flying, and another for aiming and shooting. And I’m pretty sure it has a target selecting system.

Watch from this point to 3:27 and you’ll see what I mean.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uhZdJsqsJHk#t=2m12s

Read full topic

item.title: Surface Tension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
I’m sorry, but I didn’t have any trouble at all with the helicopter fight. I just pelted it with rockets while sprinting back and forth, and went back into the storage room whenever I needed more rockets or to top of my health and suit power, and it went down really quickly. I never even needed the supply crate.

Read full topic

item.description:

Thezombiemessia:

The way I did it was to trigger the arrival of the helicopter, then rush back to the little warehouse. Thanks to the spare ammunition in there for the experimental laser gun thing, I just shot it with that until it flew away.

I’ve done it exactly that way. In warehouse inside wooden box, there are Uranium for that Tau Cannon.

I find mines on the walls and i can’t figure a way pass them. if i shoot them it blows up the whole place. if i try to jump them i touch the laser and :fffuuu:BOOM.:fffuuu:

item.title: Surface Tension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Noukami22
item.description:
It seems I can’t advance anywhere, after the chopper is dead. The door (in the room where I found the rocket launcher) is not opening, no-clipping through it doesn’t seem to accomplish anything, so unless that’s NOT the way I’m supposed to be going, the game bugged.

Any advice? I tried searching on this topic, with no results sooooo I’m creating a thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Surface Tension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Thezombiemessia
item.description:
I found that if you just jump straight into the water, chances are you’ll be killed or have little to no health left by the time you get rid of it.

The way I did it was to trigger the arrival of the helicopter, then rush back to the little warehouse. Thanks to the spare ammunition in there for the experimental laser gun thing, I just shot it with that until it flew away.

Simple, and especially useful for the fact that there are 2 health packs, and 2 charge stations in that particular warehouse.

Read full topic
item.source: Surface Tension: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Surface Tension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: rjthorne
item.description:
Max15946:

Jump across the lasers and don’t use the doors just continue down the hall once you get to the main room go through the shelves and break the wooden box once that is done go left and get the the room on at the end of the passage go upstairs look down at a box on a lift and shoot it until it breaks then press the button and get on the lift then run and jump into the the main lift and fist the hivecannon and take the lift down and win!

Thanks for the reply…

I’m up to here:

The stairs are just along the corridor to the right. Is that laser supposed to be jumpable?

Read full topic
item.source: Surface Tension: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Surface Tension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Max15946
item.description:
rjthorne:

In Surface Tension… you know the one

A mini walkthrough of this little area would be hugely appreciated. As much as I hate asking for help, I can’t figure out the way through for the life of me and after about an hour of constant dying I am at my wits’ end!

Many thanks!

Jump across the lasers and don’t use the doors just continue down the hall once you get to the main room go through the shelves and break the wooden box once that is done go left and get the the room on at the end of the passage go upstairs look down at a box on a lift and shoot it until it breaks then press the button and get on the lift then run and jump into the the main lift and fist the hivecannon and take the lift down and win!

Read full topic
